{{Enemy Intro}}

One [[Local Legend]] '''Frost Operative''', called '''Yseut''', can be found west of the [[Statue of the Seven]] in the [[Liffey Region]].

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Swift Point
|desc_1      = Teleports near the player and thrusts forward, dealing '''70% ATK''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.
* '''Veteran/Local Legend''': This attack is either used 3 times in quick succession, or followed immediately by a '''Spinslash''' and the backflip slash of '''Frosty Interjection'''.
|file_1      = Frost Operative Blinkchase

|name_2      = Spinslash
|desc_2      = Dashes backwards, then performs a spinning slash while moving forward, dealing '''80% ATK × 3''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}}. Repeated hits have their DMG reduced according to the [[Damage Sequence]].
* This attack may be used to retaliate against continuous attacks.
* '''Veteran/Local Legend''': This attack is followed immediately by a '''Swift Point'''.

|name_3      = Frosty Interjection
|desc_3      = Performs a cross slash, fires an ice blast, and performs a blackflip slash, dealing '''50% ATK''', '''50% ATK''', '''50% ATK''', '''70% ATK''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.
* '''Veteran/Local Legend''': This attack can be followed immediately by '''Spinslash''' and/or up to 2 instances of '''Swift Point'''.
|file_3      = Frost Operative Swiftblade

|name_4      = Hunt Down
|desc_4      = Sacrifices 5% of her Max [[HP]] (or 25% of current HP if HP percentage is under 20%) to initiate Hunt Down: Locks onto the player, teleports next to the player, and performs a swift retreating slash, dealing '''40% ATK''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}}. If the first hit connects, then subsequently fires an ice beam and dashes at the player, dealing '''50% ATK''', '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.
* If the player is hit by this attack, they will receive a [[Life Bond]] equal to '''16%''' of the Operative's ATK.
** As long as this Life Bond is active, they will also be affected by a [[Corrosion]] status which drains '''0.4% Max HP + 72''' every second.
*** If the affected character is off-field, they cannot be brought below '''5% Max HP''' by this Corrosion. However, on-field characters can die to it.
** If the Hunt Down attack hits a character affected by this Life Bond, it will deal '''250%''' of its original DMG.
** This Life Bond is stackable.
** This Life Bond lasts for 10 minutes if not cleared.
* '''Veteran/Local Legend''': The full combo will always be completed regardless of whether the first hit lands.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|An elite agent among the Fatui.<br>Selected while still children, they can only become an "Operative" after many long years of training and teaching, after countless rounds have winnowed the field. They are the most outstanding soldiers among the Fatui, with extraordinary skill and unswerving loyalty.|[[Archive]]}}
